document.full_text: more than 800 people were killed and 65,000 displaced in three days of violence following a presidential election in april won by president goodluck jonathan, human rights watch said on monday.
document.title: nigeria post-election violence killed 800: rights group
lines_and_colors: more than 800 people were killed and 65,000 displaced in three days of violence following a presidential election in april won by president goodluck jonathan, human rights watch said on monday.
